title: Untitled [wizard]
marks:
Signature and Inscription

URC, on back, in penc LLC, in pencil: [RH]
description: standing man seen from behind, turned 3/4 toward PR; man has long hair and wears long robe with patches skirt and long, flowing sleeves and fuzzy tall cap, and holds a book in his PR hand and a staff in his PL hand; matted with white textured mat--taped to back of mat with masking tape
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
